reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made, comfortable, and soft, appreciating its great color, with one customer noting it's a wonderful cinnamon brown cotton sweater.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a Great Sweater!
items.body: Absolutely love the complimentary style and fit of this sweater. I ordered the black and this color is not dull, a beautiful black with white outline. Great thick quality of fabric, but not too hot. It’s soft and comfortable to wear all day. Versatile as it can be worn with jeans, skirts and dress pants. It’s such a value for the money because it can be worn to compliment many outfits. I was so impressed with this sweater because the fit was perfect and the sweater did not shrink with washing. Because this sweater checked all the boxes, I ordered another. I wear a Medium and this sweater fit true to size for reference l, I am 5’5” and I weigh 143 pounds. Read more
items.author: CC7

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sweater
items.body: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sweater. Color is bright, beautiful and clean. Super soft and comfortable to wear. A tad oversize (I normally wear an XL but could wear a L in this - except I like the oversize fit). Super cute! Read more
items.author: Lori Smith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and cute
items.body: Fun color for the holidays. Ctr simple sweater. Runs a little big. Really like it with jeans Read more
items.author: Kayleen Spallone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Washed up nicely
items.body: I love it. Just the right thickness and nice and warm and attractive. Read more
items.author: HOLLY Fonville

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous but design flaw- see update notes
items.body: The green sweater is actually a true green! Not teal or some other odd blue green mix. So that’s a plus already. And it fits great, cozy but not too thick. So happy! Update! After wearing it once the bottom hem/edge began to curl up. Very aggressively…. I really hope an iron will take care of it but still, it seems odd and a lot of work on the side if it happens after each wear/wash. Time will tell…. Read more
items.author: isu94

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite sweater
items.body: The perfect sweater! Warm and cozy but not too heavy. Love this sweater and I got lots of compliments on it!! Great quality! Read more
items.author: Ali Hathcock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, cozy and comfortable
items.body: So soft and perfect for layering or with just a tank or cami under it. Took on vacation to Rhode Island and it was perfect for the fall weather! Read more
items.author: pinellas71

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it, but will shrink
items.body: I love this sweater. The blue color is beautiful and the quality is good. It did shrink quite a bit, so be sure to order a size up if you want it to be oversized. After shrinkage, it fits fine but is no longer oversized like I expected. Read more
items.author: Cindy F.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose Tan, Sky Blue, Gold, Blackish Green, White, Pure White, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Red Dahlia, Grey, Pale Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
